TopicTitle: [Stock + PWings] Tiny Cat Aircraft Work (TC ACW). FAR airplanes, and other crafts

Articles.Content:
Aircraft

Procedural Wings + Stock Craft

Aircraft made in FAR

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Maneuverable aircraft with several variants.

Press 1 to increase flaps.

Press 2 to decrease flaps. (Warning! Flaps cause pitching up without nose-down trim, especially if they are set at the most angle.)

Press 3 to toggle dive/air brakes.

Press 4 to toggle rocket boosters. (Only Mk. I-R.)

Press 5 to toggle steering of wheels. (Warning! Do not pull hard turns at speeds greater than around 10 km/h!)

Press 0 to toggle the crew ladder(s).

Not capable of sustained supercruise. Can cruise at trans-sonic speeds.

Highest speed achieved in test flight, Mk. I-R. variant: ~Mach 1.21

Dive Speed (Mk. I and variants): ~Mach 1.2

Be careful of wing tearing from sudden turns at high or trans-sonic speeds.

Excellent, mostly stable maneuvering at low altitudes, perfect for stunts.

High speed at low altitudes. (Up to ~Mach 0.95 nearer to sea level.)

Variants and Downloads:

Mk. I: First production variant of Ocelot. - Download

Mk. I-E.: Ocelot Mk I with two, jettisonable drop tanks for increased range. - Download

Mk. I-R.: Experimental rocket-boosted interceptor. Also can cruise at high trans-sonic speeds. - Download

Mk. II: Two-seater trainer version. Less maneuverable for trainee pilots or less enthusiastic civilian pilots. - Download

Mk. III: High-altitude Mk. I with increased wingspan - wingtips have been attached to the wings to add around/about 35% wingspan to them. - Download

Kleinrover

100% (Completely) Stock Craft

FAR compatible

Javascript is disabled. View full album

A small rover. Learning German, so in the spirit of "Deutschsprachig," the crafts' names are German

Kleinrover EINS (One) is a Stayputnik-based tiny rover with built in antenna (toggle with 2), science equipment (4 sensors, activate by pressing 3), and a small reaction wheel (toggle with 1) to use for getting back up. Warning! With "getting-up-torque" ON, craft is very difficult to drive unless you've set your rover driving keys to something else (e.g. IJKL) instead of WASD, since the reaction wheel is very powerful for the rover's size, but it's the smallest SAS wheel available in the stock game.

Kleinrover ZWEI (Two) is a low-profile compact OKTO2-based tiny rover. This one is more barebones, with no SAS, science or even communications antenna/equipment. Press 1 to toggle the OKTO2's tiny probe core torque. It has a much smaller vertical profile than the Eins model, though, and is capable of climbing very steep hills compared to the Eins model! (See album for an example.)

Downloads:

Kleinrover Eins

Kleinrover Zwei
